titles.title: Mongolia Third Neighbor Trade Act
Mongolia Third Neighbor Trade Act
A bill to promote United States-Mongolia trade by authorizing duty-free treatment for certain imports from Mongolia, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Mongolia Third Neighbor Trade Act
This bill allows the President to provide duty-free treatment for certain apparel and textile articles imported from Mongolia. This duty-free treatment expires on December 31, 2029.
The President must annually monitor, review, and provide a briefing to Congress on (1) the implementation of this duty-free treatment, (2) Mongolia's compliance with the eligibility requirements described in the bill, and (3) U.S. trade and investment policy with respect to Mongolia.
